author: Dr15Jones
body: HepPDT::HeavyIonUnknownID creates a new particle in the case the HepPDT does not know of that particle by default. However, nothing deletes that particle. This code wraps HeavyIonUnknownID and does a thread safe cache of the particle in order to delete it later.
title: Fix leak from HepPDT::HeavyIonUnknownID
